reviewText:
This video is not only informative, it's interesting!
I recommend this to all levels of air brush artists from beginners to advanced. This is a great teaching tool to introduce air brush techniques and inspire individuals to go the extra step using stencils to add details and layers.
This guy is a excellent with technique and ability and teaching

Another grand book on the use of the airbrush and the various things that you are abile to do with the abilities to USE one.
Well written and well illustrated. Fast book to received and oneI would recommend to even a beginner.

This video is excellent resource on how to prep the surface,how to map out projects,how to protect against overspray &
underspray,how mix colors, plus advanced airbrush techniques. This is a must buy video for beginners, and professional airbrushers alike
.
This video is a GREAT educational tool, that you can go back to over, and over again. Buy It Now.
Great video with a lot of great techniques in it! Ive been airbrushing for a while now and get a video from time to time. I would definetly recommend this to anyone.  Great Job cross-eyed!
